47 #include <stdint.h>

57 void app_error_handler(uint32_t error_code, uint32_t line_num, const uint8_t * p_file_name);
58 
64 #define APP_ERROR_CHECK(ERR_CODE) \
65 do \
66 { \
67  const uint32_t LOCAL_ERR_CODE = (ERR_CODE); \
68  if (LOCAL_ERR_CODE != NRF_SUCCESS) \
69  { \
70  app_error_handler((ERR_CODE), __LINE__, (uint8_t*) __FILE__); \
71  } \
72 } while (0)
73 
74 #endif /* CODEBASE_ASSERT_ERROR_APP_ERROR_H_ */
